name: A Happy Revolution
description:
This game is about moving around in a dungeon, solving puzzles, talking to NPCs and
in the end defeating the tyrant.

Made by Joakim Pettersvold(Discord: @joapet99)
With Godot engine
For Godot Wild Jam #22

Controls

You need a keyboard and a mouse to play this game.

Movement: W,A,S,D or the arrow keys

Proceed in dialogue: Left mouse button

For nixos users:

The game runs fine with `steam-run`

Source:

https://gitlab.com/joakim1999/godot-wild-jam-22
